articles.title: Another child has died of the flu in Mass.
articles.description:
A total of 260 people have died from flu-related causes in Massachusetts this season.

The post Another child has died of the flu in Mass. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Another child has died from the flu in Massachusetts this season.
A total of 260 flu-related deaths have been reported in the state.
Residents are urged to get vaccinated to prevent further fatalities.

articles.title: Mass. police department offers ‘Valentine’s Day Special’ for wanted exes
articles.description:
“Remember — love fades. Warrants don’t.”

The post Mass. police department offers ‘Valentine’s Day Special’ for wanted exes appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts police offer a 'Valentine’s Day Special' for apprehending wanted exes.
The campaign highlights ongoing warrants, encouraging community engagement in law enforcement.
Residents are reminded that love fades, but legal issues remain unresolved.
